knowledge: Jamba Juice . Jamba, Inc. and its wholly owned subsidiary Jamba Juice Company form an American restaurant retailer headquartered in Frisco, Texas and previously headquartered in Emeryville, California. The company has over 875 locations operating in 26 U.S. states, as well as The Philippines, Mexico, Taiwan, South Korea, Thailand and the United Arab Emirates. There are approximately 68 company-owned locations and 752 franchise-operated stores in the United States, in addition to the 65 international stores.
